metadata.title: CVE-2010-4209 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.8.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla 3.7.1through 3.7.3 and 4.1, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via vectors related to swfstore/swfstore.swf.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-yui - 2.8.2r1~squeeze-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yui package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.2r1~squeeze-1').
webgui package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
loggerhead package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
